title: Client froze and i lost my loot
body: Hey I tried opening one of my hextech chests, it consumed my key and then the client froze. I restarted my client and the chest and key were gone but there was no loot. Can anyone help me out?

replies.body: It looks like you got the Carnival Teemo 2015 icon from that chest. If you open a hextech chest and get an icon, it is automatically redeemed and put into your list of available icons. Be sure to check your icons for that teemo!
